title: Le Crobag
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Take-out, Bakery, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain bakery branch in the Hamburg Altona station. Sells baked goods, sandwiches, and hot drinks. Offers vegan baguettes filled with either tofu, basil and tomato, or herb spread and cucumber. Note: There are two branches of Le Crobag in the station. The one near the long-distance trains/"Handelshaus" is the one with vegan baguettes.
